original_title: Lang Lang:  Portrait of an Exceptional Pianist
overview: Lang Lang is already an undisputed international star of the piano. A "Wunderkind" like Mozart, Lang Lang is a demi-god in China and a superstar in the rest of the world. Portrait of An Exceptional Artist reveals not only a piano prodigy, but also a deeply involved artist and mentor. From his lessons in China, to his master classes in France, the passing of his expertise to others is central to Lang Lang's life and work. This documentary lets us discover Lang Lang from the thread of his childhood to the daily life of an artist of international renown. Concert performances produced in conjunction with Sony Music.
title: Lang Lang:  Portrait of an Exceptional Pianist
